port.title: Port Number
port.description: If the port is not available, the server will find and listen any available port.

exts.title: Additional Extensions
exts.description: The server will watch these comma-separated extensions as well as the defaults.
exts.default: html, htm, css, js, png, gif, jpg, php, php5, py, rb, erb, coffee

exclusions.title: Additional Exclusions
exclusions.description: The server will ignore these paths in addition to the defaults.

applyCSSLive.title: Apply CSS Live
applyCSSLive.description: If checked, LiveReload will reload CSS files without refreshing the page.

applyImageLive.title: Apply Image Live
applyImageLive.description: If checked, LiveReload will reload image files without refreshing the page.

delayForUpdate.title: Delay for Update in Milliseconds
delayForUpdate.description: When the number is more than 0, the server add a delay before forcing browser to refresh.

autoStart.title: Auto Start Server
autoStart.description: If checked, the livereload server will automatically start whenever new Atom window is opened.

statusBarText.title: Status Bar Text
statusBarText.description: Change the default text shown in the status bar.
